title: Home
overview: Along with her husband and three children, Marthe lives in an eden of her own creation, nearly isolated from the rest of the world.  The arrival of a construction vehicle, however, pierces their tranquil, hermetic existenceâ€”before long a disused highway has been re-opened, and the family finds their home situated in the midst of rush-hour traffic.  While the privileges of clean air, quietude and privacy are thus denied them, Marthe remains determined to stay no matter the cost.
